summary.overview: This JCL compiles a CICS program and performs an immediate deployment to the CICS region without requiring system downtime. It ensures the updated program is available for online transaction processing immediately after successful compilation.
business_functions: Compile CICS program CICSPGMN to create executable version
Refresh program in CICS memory to activate latest version without system restart
Enable immediate deployment of program updates to online environment

CICCMP.jcl.program_overview: System Display and Search Facility - Executes CICS commands to refresh programs in memory

datasource_summary.name: System Output Log (SYSOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures system messages and output from SDSF program execution for monitoring and logging purposes

datasource_summary.name: CICS Command Input Stream (ISFIN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains inline CICS command data to perform NEWCOPY operation on program CICSPGMN, instructing CICS to refresh the program in memory

datasource_summary.name: CICS Utility Procedure Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PRC.UTIL)
datasource_summary.function: Procedure library containing JCL procedures including BUILDONL used for CICS program compilation process
